metadata.title: Lisette L Montreal Solid Magical Lycra Ankle Pants
features: Create a magical look, from the office to an evening out, in these stunning ankle pants.
Classic, ankle length pant with a slim fit leg.
Constructed with fabric that moves with you, staying true to shape.
Pull-on design features built-in tummy control with flattering panel and contoured waistband.
Logo charm at the right front hip.
